content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello, Mary Smith. It's a pleasure to meet you. I understand you're interested in renting my apartment in New York. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. How much were you considering?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mr. Heine. I'm interested in your apartment because of its location and the amenities it offers. I'm looking to keep my expenses low as I'm a student. Could you tell me what the lowest price you can offer is for this 25-square-meter apartment?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: As a landlord, I always aim to provide a fair price for my apartments while also ensuring I receive a reasonable return on my investment. For a 25-square-meter apartment, I would typically look at the market rates and set a price that reflects the value of the space. However, since you're a student and looking to keep your expenses low, I'm willing to negotiate. What price range were you hoping for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mr. Heine, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I was hoping for a price around $1,200 per month, all utilities included. This would be a fair price for both parties, considering my budget as a student and the value of the apartment. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Mary, your offer of $1,200 per month for the apartment, including utilities, is very close to what I had in mind. Considering your student status and the fact that you're looking to keep your expenses low, I'm willing to accept your offer. TERMINATE
name: Heinrich Heine
